service.name: Dipping Nails with Extentions
service.info: Nails are made longer by attaching false nail extentions

service.name: Full Set Acrylic with Regular Polish
Deluxe Manicure
service.info: Paraffin wax dip included with manicure

service.name: Deluxe Manicure with Gel Polish
service.info: Paraffin wax dip included with gel manicure

service.name: Basic Pedicure
service.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, then polish.

service.name: Spa Pedicure
service.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, massage with orange and lime slices, cooling mask applied with warm towel wrap, then finish with polishing.

service.name: Deluxe Pedicure
service.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, massage with orange and lime slices, cooling mask with warm towel wrap, massage with hot rocks then finish with polishing.

service.name: Tropical Pedicure
service.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, massage with orange and lime slices, cooling mask with warm towel wrap, massage with hot rocks, feet are then dipped in paraffin wax, then finish with polishing.

service.name: Design (2 toes or fingers)
service.info: Prices may change depending on the quantity of nails

service.name: Gel Polish with any service
service.info: Any service with gel polish is an additional $15
